featured.text: Natives planted the fruit across South and Central America and in the Caribbean region, 23 Christopher Columbus first found it.

definition.zh_def: 克里斯多福，一個常見的男性名字，源自希臘語，意為「基督的承載者」。
definition.en_def: Christopher is a common male given name derived from Greek, meaning 'bearer of Christ.'
definition.example: Christopher loves to explore new places during his travels.
